body:
Comment 9 by **jrnieder**: 
The patch is at
<svn://svn.debian.org/pkg-glibc/glibc-package/trunk/debian/patches/any/local-dl-deps.diff>.
 Once the patch tracker gets wind of it, it will also be at
<http://patch-tracker.debian.org/patch/series/view/eglibc/2.13-1/any/local-dl-deps.diff>;.

Yes, I suspect it will be pushed back to mainline glibc (and adopted by other distros
quickly afterwards).  If the patch looks sane, the best thing would be to file it at
http://www.sourceware.org/bugzilla/ and send the bug number to 624515@bugs.debian.org .
